trans-unit.target: 客户端来源：https : //github.com/AppEnlight/appenlight-client-python

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the middleware stack needs to be modified with additional middleware:
trans-unit.target: 此外,还需要修改中间件栈,增加中间件。

trans-unit.source: App Enlight will try to import foo.bar.baz and use callable_name as the function that accepts parameters (structure, section) and returns altered data structure.
trans-unit.target: App Enlight会尝试导入foo.bar.baz,并使用callable_name作为函数,接受参数(structure,section)并返回改变后的数据结构。

trans-unit.source: Before you can use the client inside your application, you first need to navigate to the directory that stores your application configuration and issue the following command:
trans-unit.target: 在你可以在你的应用程序里面使用客户端之前,你首先需要导航到存储你的应用程序配置的目录,然后发出以下命令。

trans-unit.source: Changing default scaffold configuration in Pyramid Web Framework
trans-unit.target: 更改Pyramid Web框架中的默认脚手架配置。

trans-unit.source: Client for AppEnlight reporting - WSGI applications and django monitoring (http://getappenlight.com)
trans-unit.target: AppEnlight报告客户端--WSGI应用程序和django监控(http://getappenlight.com)

trans-unit.source: Configuring appenlight and django
trans-unit.target: 配置appenlight和django

trans-unit.source: Default scaffolds in pyramid 1.3 have a section called [app:main] - the App Enlight client expects that you are using wsgi pipeline instead to position itself in it.
trans-unit.target: 金字塔1.3中的默认支架有一个名为[app：main]的部分-App Enlight客户端希望您使用的是wsgi管道，而不是将其自身放置在其中。

trans-unit.source: Exception views in a Pyramid Web Framework and Appenlight
trans-unit.target: 在Pyramid Web框架和Appenlight中的异常视图。

trans-unit.source: For a django framework, there is separate compatible middleware provided.
trans-unit.target: 对于django框架,有单独提供兼容的中间件。

trans-unit.source: For a pylons app, you can modify config/middleware.py: import the callable and add these lines:
trans-unit.target: 对于pylons应用,你可以修改config/middleware.py:导入callable并添加这些行。

trans-unit.source: If for some reason you want to disable the timing of specific library, just set the time value to false.
trans-unit.target: 如果出于某种原因想禁止特定库的定时,只需将时间值设置为false即可。

trans-unit.source: In your INI file, you need to add:
trans-unit.target: 在你的INI文件中,你需要添加。

trans-unit.source: Install the
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Installation and Setup
trans-unit.target: 安装和设置

trans-unit.source: Main Documentation location
trans-unit.target: 主要文件位置

trans-unit.source: Modify your settings file to contain:
trans-unit.target: 修改你的设置文件,包含:

trans-unit.source: Please note that the App Enlight middleware should be placed first in your stack to function properly.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,App Enlight中间件应该首先放在您的堆栈中才能正常运行。

trans-unit.source: Please note that this functionality can be used to alter things like the App Enlight grouping mechanism; you can set this variable based on values present in the structure generated by the client.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,这个功能可以用来改变像App Enlight分组机制这样的东西;你可以根据客户端生成的结构中存在的值来设置这个变量。

trans-unit.source: Pyramid uses exception views to serve nice html templates when an exception occurs. Unfortunately, this means that an exception is handled BEFORE it reaches App Enlight’s middleware, so any 500 error data will never get sent to App Enlight.
trans-unit.target: 当发生异常时，Pyramid使用异常视图来提供漂亮的html模板。不幸的是，这意味着在异常到达App Enlight的中间件之前就已对其进行了处理，因此任何500个错误数据将永远不会发送到App Enlight。

trans-unit.source: Run your django app providing the APPENLIGHT_INI env variable containing the absolute path to your config file.
trans-unit.target: 运行你的django应用,提供包含配置文件绝对路径的APPENLIGHT_INI环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Sensitive data filtering
trans-unit.target: 敏感数据过滤

trans-unit.source: The App Enlight client provides slow call and datastore timing capabilities; current out-of-the-box libraries supported:
trans-unit.target: App Enlight客户端提供慢速调用和数据存储定时功能;支持当前开箱即用的库。

trans-unit.source: The App Enlight developer documentation contains the most up to date information, including implementation guides in popular python web frameworks.
trans-unit.target: App Enlight开发者文档包含了最新的信息,包括流行的Python Web框架的实现指南。

trans-unit.source: The client by default blanks out COOKIE,POST, and GET for keys like: ‘password’,’passwd’,’pwd’,’auth_tkt’
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，客户端会清空COOKIE，POST和GET等密钥，例如：'password'，'passwd'，'pwd'，'auth_tkt'

trans-unit.source: The easiest way to accomplish that is to alter your configuration file to look like this:
trans-unit.target: 最简单的方法就是把配置文件改成这样。

trans-unit.source: This behaviour can be altered to filter all kinds of data from the structures that get sent to the server by passing a dotted module name in configuration:
trans-unit.target: 这种行为可以通过在配置中传递一个带点的模块名称来改变,从发送到服务器的结构中过滤各种数据。

trans-unit.source: This is how you can handle error handling inside your error_view:
trans-unit.target: 这就是如何在你的error_view中处理错误处理。

trans-unit.source: To minimize configuration complexity, the client will, by default, look for the APPENLIGHT_INI environment variable that will supply the absolute path to the config file.
trans-unit.target: 为了减少配置的复杂性,客户端默认会寻找APPENLIGHT_INI环境变量,它将提供配置文件的绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 使用方法

trans-unit.target: 用法(例如用于金字塔或其他WSGI管道兼容解决方案,如Zope)。

trans-unit.target: 并添加到你的ini中。

trans-unit.source: and inside your configuration, above the [server:main] directive, the following directive should appear:
trans-unit.target: 在配置内部的[server：main]指令上方，应显示以下指令：

trans-unit.target: appenlight_client
